titles.title: He's A Wonderful Saviour To Me

authors.author: Blanche Kerr Brock Virgil P. Brock

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: For He's a wonderful Savior to me, newline He's a wonderful Savior to me. newline I was lost in sin, newline But Jesus took me in. newline He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I was lost in sin, newline But Jesus rescued me. newline He's a wonderful Savior to me. newline I was bound by fear, newline But Jesus set me free. newline He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He's a friend so true, newline So patient and so kind. newline He's wonderful Savior to me, newline Ev'rything I need in Him I always find. newline He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He is always near, newline To comfort and to cheer. newline He's a wonderful Savior to me, newline He forgives my sin, newline He dries my ev'ry tear, newline He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Dearer grows the love newline Of Jesus day by day, newline He's a wonderful Savior to me, newline Sweeter is His grace, newline While pressing on my way. newline He's a wonderful Savior to me.
